item.title: #en @ 1483771832754913280
item.description:
Why, if @BSI_UK is a government appointed national standards body, are their published standards not Open Data? The Ordnance Survey had to make a lot of data public, when do BSI join that list?!
How can we be expected to comply with standards we can't see without paying for?

item.title: #en @ 1483580383228739587
item.description:
There's been lots of news coverage about what the Russian military has been up to recently, so I wrote about it in the only way I know how: with satellite images and open data.

item.description: My Great Grandma Rosemary was the fiercest person I ever met. She fought for what she believed in (primarily women's rights) all the way to the age of 94.
